description: This file configures the Angular application by setting up providers such as routing, HTTP client, zone change detection, and hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up routing with specified routes.

methods.name: provideHttpClient
methods.description: Prepares HTTP client with fetch API integration.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables hydration for client-side rendering with event replay.
